member.summary: Deletes a row given its ID.

member.summary: Returns a DataSet given the primary key.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.GetList(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Returns a list of rows that satisfy the where clause.
member.param: An expression used to filter the rows. Can be left blank for all rows.
The maximum number of rows to return. Leave as zero for no maximum.
Whether there are more pages of rows available.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.GetRows(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Returns a dataset containing all rows that satisfy the where clauses.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.Update(Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: Commits the DataSet changes to the data store.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.UpdateExt(Epicor.Mfg.BO.UpdExtOpMasterDataSet,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Apply input data to BO by calling GetByID/GetNew/Update methods.
member.returns: The dataset with list of errors occured during update process.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.GetCodeDescList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: To return the CodeDescriptionList values of a given table.field.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeCapabilityID(System.String,Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: Method to call when changing the Capability ID. Blank is a valid entry for Capability ID.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeOpMasRestrictionType(Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: This methods assigns associated fields when OpMasRestriction.RestrictionTypeID changes.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeOpMasRestrictSubstance(Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: This methods assigns associated fields when OpMasRestrictSubst.SubstanceID changes.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeOpMasterPrimaryProdOpDtl(System.Int32,Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: This method checks if the entered primary production operation detail is valid. This method should run when the OpMaster.ScrPrimaryProdOpDtl field changes.
member.param: The proposed primary production operation detail sequence

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeOpMasterPrimarySetupOpDtl(System.Int32,Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: This method checks if the entered primary setup operation detail is valid. This method should run when the OpMaster.ScrPrimarySetupOpDtl field changes.
member.param: The proposed primary setup operation detail sequence

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeResourceGrpID(System.String,Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: Method to call when changing the Resource Group ID. This method will update OpMasDtl with the default labor and burden rates from the new resource group. Blank is a valid entry for Resource Group ID.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeResourceID(System.String,Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: Method to call when changing the Resource ID. Blank is a valid entry for Resource ID.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.ChangeVendorNumVendorID(System.String,Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet)
member.summary: Method to call when changing the Vendor Num. Blank is a valid entry for Vendor Num.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.CheckInactiveSchedRequirement(Epicor.Mfg.BO.OpMasterDataSet,System.String@)
member.summary: Method to call check the capability, resource group, or resource is active. This method should be called prior to calling the Update method on an OpMasDtl record. Will return message text to present to the user if the code is inactive. The message is asking the user if it is ok to save the record with an inactive code. If the user answers yes, the record can be saved. If a blank value is returned for InactiveMessage, continue as normal - no special processing needs to occur.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.GetByIDandOpType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A variation of the standard GetByID. Gets a OpMaster for a specific OpCode with consideration of OpType(s). Note OpType is a comma separated list of Operation types to be considered valid for this Get. Used as a predecessor to calling GetByID.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.InsertCapability(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This methods allows for the insertion of Capability on an operation to create operation detail for drag/drop functionality.
member.param: The rowid of the OpMaster record to add the operation detail to
The operation detail rowid to insert operation detail before

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.InsertResource(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This methods allows for the insertion of Resource on an operation to create operation detail for drag/drop functionality.
member.param: The rowid of the OpMaster record to add the operation detail to
The operation detail rowid to insert operation detail before

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.IF.IOpMaster.InsertResourceGroup(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: This methods allows for the insertion of Resource Group on an operation to create operation detail for drag/drop functionality.
member.param: The rowid of the OpMaster record to add the operation detail to
The Resource Group ID being added
The operation detail rowid to insert operation detail before
